mapper.select: select permission.* from (select * from t_user where t_user.id = #{id}) as user left join t_user_role_relation as user_role on user.id = user_role.user_id left join t_role role on user_role.role_id = role.id left join t_role_permission_relation as role_permission on role.id = role_permission.role_id left join t_permission as permission on permission.id = role_permission.permission_id
